'''Hydro Mimic Squirrels''' are [[Hydro Mimics]] summoned by the [[Rhodeia of Loch|Oceanid]], but can also be encountered on their own in the [[Spiral Abyss]] or during [[Quests]]. They resemble normal [[Squirrel]]s.

==Abilities==
''Most ability names are unofficial.''
{{Enemy Attacks
|enemy = Mimic Ferret

|name_1 = Heal
|desc_1 = Every 1.5 seconds, heals itself for '''3.75%''' of its Max [[HP]]. The healing will be disabled for 3 seconds after being hit by a {{Pyro}} attack.

|name_2 = Sweep
|desc_2 = Sweeps its tail at the player, dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Hydro DMG}}. The special variant will also send out a water blade, dealing '''50% ATK''' as {{Color|Hydro DMG}} on hit.
|file_2_2 = Mimic Ferret Sweep 2

|name_3 = Slam
|desc_3 = Jumps and claws at the player, dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Hydro DMG}}.

|name_4 = Spinning Slam
|desc_4 = This attacks is exclusive to the special variant. Jumps, spins while airborne and slams down, dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Hydro DMG}}. A splash will then occur at the impacted location, dealing '''80% ATK''' as {{Color|Hydro DMG}}.
}}

==Strategy==
If the player continuously walks closely around them in a circle, they would turn to face the player and would not attack.
